overview: Woody Allen meets Frances Ha in this new British drama by first-time feature director, poet, actor and publisher Greta Bellamacina. Greta also stars as Celeste, a young mother trying to carve out a career as a poet in modern-day London. Meanwhile, friend and neighbour Stella (played by co-writer Sadie Brown), dreams of being an actor but spends much of her time babysitting Celesteâ€™s son. Part ode to the city, this is a skilfully observed tale of friendship and family with a refreshingly understated sense of humour.
tagline: A film about a poet and a girl with big hair.
title: Hurt By Paradise
